articles.title: NASA asteroid hitting earth: What we know so far - Firstpost
articles.description: In a hypothetical exercise, NASA discovered that a previously undetected asteroid had a 72 per cent chance of colliding with Earth.
articles.content: However, NASA stated that the first observations were inadequate to accurately establish the asteroid’s size, composition, and long-term track.
